thread.title: Shepard Fairey - Obama Hope Poster, Election 2016 And Rebel Music
thread.title_full: Shepard Fairey - Obama Hope Poster, Election 2016 And Rebel Music

author: Jade Walker
title: Shepard Fairey - Obama Hope Poster, Election 2016 And Rebel Music
text:
Shepard Fairey - Obama Hope Poster, Election 2016 And Rebel Music Esquire | By MATT PATCHES reddit ASSOCIATED PRESS 
Street artist Shepard Fairey and the Viacom-owned MTV, home to teen moms and teen wolves, are the Felix and Oscar of American culture wars. That they found common ground is something of a triumph.
